objects.name: DNSCalc
objects.description:
DNS Calc is a technique in which the octets of an IP address are used to calculate the port  for command and control servers from an initial DNS request. (Citation: CrowdstrikeNumberedPanda) (Citation: FireEyeDarwinsAPTGroup) (Citation: Rapid7G20Espionage)

Detectable by Common Defenses: No

Difficulty for the Adversary: Yes

external_references.description: Adam Meyers. (2013, March 29). Whois Numbered Panda. Retrieved March 6, 2017.
Ned Moran, Mike Oppenheim. (2014, September 3). Darwin’s Favorite APT Group. Retrieved March 6, 2017.
nex. (2013, August 26). Upcoming G20 Summit Fuels Espionage Operations. Retrieved March 6, 2017.
